title: Dwarf Fortress
mainText: Mushroom Wine now adds an additional {r:booze=1}.{n}When you discover a Dwarf during exploration you may pay {r:booze=5} to put them into Drawf Fortress instead of bidding.{n}Pay {r:booze=3}: Put one of the Dwarves in the Fortress on top of the exploration pile.
flavourText: Neither elves, nor goblins can ever hope to enter.
